```{r load}
library(leaflet)
df<-read.csv('coords.csv')

NPicon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "npslogo.png",
  iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
  iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)
leaflet(df) %>% addTiles() %>% 
        addMarkers(lng=df$Long,lat=df$Lat,
                        label = df$ParkName,
                        icon = NPicon)
```
